name: Slime Condensate
desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

customize.name: Pyro Slime
customize.desc:
A small monster created by the sedimentation of Pyro dispersed throughout nature.
Its intelligence is very basic, but its uses are just as broad — well, for hilichurls, that is.

customize.name: Large Pyro Slime
customize.desc:
A monster created by the sedimentation of Pyro dispersed throughout nature.
Though its intelligence has not increased with its size, it is very hot. During dry seasons, it can cause wildfires. It will spit forth blazing fireballs when angered, and will turn dark when it is feeling down. A most expressive slime, indeed.

customize.name: Hydro Slime
customize.desc:
A small monster created by the sedimentation of Hydro dispersed throughout nature.
Legend has it that some people would use Hydro Slimes as an emergency water source, packing them in preparation for travels through dry regions or deep domains. But due to the high concentration of Hydro within these slimes, direct ingestion is, in fact, harmful to the human body.

customize.name: Large Hydro Slime
customize.desc:
A monster created by the sedimentation of Hydro dispersed throughout nature.
A larger and more powerful Hydro Slime that can create bubbles to entrap its enemies. It is said that they can grow to truly staggering sizes if given an energy-rich environment. Eyewitnesses have supposedly seen Hydro Slimes as large as a small mound in Wolvendom.

customize.name: Anemo Slime
customize.desc:
A small monster created by the coalescing of Anemo dispersed throughout nature.
It is able to float in the air to a certain degree due to the power of Anemo.

customize.name: Large Anemo Slime
customize.desc:
A monster created by the coalescing of Anemo dispersed throughout nature.
Owing to being comprised of a greater concentration of Anemo, their flotation abilities are stronger than that of Anemo Slimes. The hilichurls living out in the wilds have made use of this special characteristic, creating special vehicles that use Large Anemo Slimes as a form of locomotion to transport goods from unknown sources.

customize.name: Electro Slime
customize.desc:
A small monster created by the coalescing of Electro dispersed throughout nature.
According to analyses, the jumping of Electro Slimes reflects the electric potential difference in the ground. In areas brimming over with Electro, their unusual movements can be observed and used to avoid danger.

customize.name: Large Electro Slime
customize.desc:
A monster created by the coalescing of Electro dispersed throughout nature.
Due to the abundant Electro within its form, it will deliver an electric shock to its surroundings from time to time. At present, some have attempted to harness this energy to aid in production activities. Perhaps some new science will be born from this...?

customize.name: Mutant Electro Slime
customize.desc:
A monster created by the coalescing of Electro dispersed throughout nature.
Electro Slimes can undergo mutations to become bright yellow. Due to the abundant Electro within its form, it will deliver an electric shock to its surroundings from time to time, and it can even cause nearby Electro Slimes to release electric arcs. This arc lightning will not bounce between purple Electro Slimes, which shows that Electro Slimes have two different polarities.
One wonders if some great new science could emerge from the study of such phenomena...

customize.name: Dendro Slime
customize.desc:
A slime that has undergone ecological changes due to abundant Dendro in its environment.
It has also taken on the weaknesses of the Dendro element, and will burn intensely the moment it meets a bright flame.

customize.name: Large Dendro Slime
customize.desc:
A slime that has undergone ecological changes due to abundant Dendro in its environment.
There are some who see it as something similar to the Whopperflowers, hiding its true form to trick and hunt its prey, and some regard it as a slime that has been parasitized by some special plant. From this point of view, might some cultures also see these slimes as having some special medicinal value?

customize.name: Cryo Slime
customize.desc:
A small monster created through the coagulation of Cryo in the natural environment.
Competitors once spread malicious rumors that the Dawn Winery used Cryo Slimes to control the temperature of their wine cellar and preserve the quality of their alcohol.

customize.name: Large Cryo Slime
customize.desc:
A monster created through the coagulation of Cryo in the natural environment.
These slimes can use the abundant Cryo energies within themselves to freeze the moisture in the atmosphere and form a protective shell around themselves. They can also utilize a similar principle to freeze the water around them. On some level, this can be considered to be the freest species of slime, as it can cross oceans and seas with ease.

customize.name: Geo Slime
customize.desc:
Small monsters created through the buildup of Geo within the earth.
Generally speaking, the crust of the earth is filled with Geo energy. Geo Slimes that are formed this way have a similarly "down-to-earth" sort of feeling.

customize.name: Large Geo Slime
customize.desc:
Monsters created through the buildup of Geo within the earth.
They can harden the energy within their bodies into a carapace of stone that protects them and prevents damage. The legend of a "Golden Geo Slime King" once circulated among the Treasure Hoarders. They believed that since gemstones and ores have Geo energy in them, Geo Slimes, which also contain Geo energy, may also be a type of gemstone or ore.

customize.name: Slime Condensate
customize.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

customize.name: Masterless Stardust
customize.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

customize.name: Arataki Itto
customize.desc: The first and greatest head of the Arataki Gang, famed throughout Inazuma City's Hanamizaka... Wait, what? You've never heard of them? Are you trying to be funny here?

customize.name: Xiao
customize.desc: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

customize.name: Zhongli
customize.desc: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

customize.name: Venti
customize.desc: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

customize.name: Gaming
customize.desc: Guard of the Sword and Strongbox Secure Transport Agency, and the head of the "Mighty Mythical Beasts" Wushou troupe.

customize.name: Yaoyao
customize.desc: Streetward Rambler's youngest disciple. A gentle and caring "little adult."

customize.name: Xiangling
customize.desc: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

customize.name: Lisa
customize.desc: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Akademiya to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

customize.name: Amos' Bow
customize.desc: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.

customize.name: Alley Hunter
customize.desc: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.

customize.name: Sacrificial Bow
customize.desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
customize.desc: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.

customize.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
customize.desc: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.

customize.name: Mappa Mare
customize.desc: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.

customize.name: Magic Guide
customize.desc: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.

customize.name: Staff of Homa
customize.desc: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.

customize.name: Missive Windspear
customize.desc: A beacon that shows the direction of the wind. Not every idyll carried on the breeze remains a gentle thing...

customize.name: Favonius Lance
customize.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

customize.name: Skyward Pride
customize.desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

customize.name: Talking Stick
customize.desc: Most people will find this obsidian-inlaid club quite convincing indeed.

customize.name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
customize.desc: The great king of the ocean. Having been air-dried, it makes for a fine weapon as well as emergency sustenance.

customize.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
customize.desc: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.

customize.name: Royal Greatsword
customize.desc: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by the nobility only.

customize.name: White Iron Greatsword
customize.desc: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power. Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadly in the hands of a physically stronger wielder.

customize.name: Old Merc's Pal
customize.desc: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

customize.name: Waster Greatsword
customize.desc: A sturdy sheet of iron that may be powerful enough to break apart mountains if wielded with enough willpower.

customize.name: Skyward Blade
customize.desc: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.

customize.name: The Black Sword
customize.desc: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.

customize.name: The Flute
customize.desc: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.

customize.name: Harbinger of Dawn
customize.desc: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.

customize.name: Slime Secretions
customize.desc: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Slime Condensate
customize.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

customize.name: False Worm Bait
customize.desc:
This imitation worm bait is made mostly out of condensate, and will twist its body according to the underwater currents, resulting in its fatal attraction to overly-curious fish. Professionals will even add some fruit to it to increase its fragrance and make it utterly irresistable.

Suitable for catching Shirakodai and Angelfish.

customize.name: Slime Condensate
customize.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

customize.name: Berry
customize.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

customize.name: Slime Secretions
customize.desc: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

customize.name: Slime Concentrate
customize.desc: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.
